title: The Forest of trees and logs
creator_credit: Jerome Kurtz, Michael Halperin, H/K Films and K Films
brief_description: The forest is explored as a place of life - an environment with inter-relationships harbouring the living, providing food, and which, even in decay brings forth vitality. Our understanding of the role forests play in the biosphere of the planet may help us aid the forests to return to the grandeur which once was theirs.
